article_title: What Big Pharma Could Learn From A Craft Beer Brewer

article_metadata.description: While U.S. companies like Pfizer (PFE), Walgreens (WAG) and Medtronic (MDT) make noise and grab political attention by looking at overseas domiciles to lower tax rates, along comes Tony Magee, brewer of the popular Lagunitas IPA from a different school of thought. He’s headed to Chicago, the largest city in the [...]
